metadata.title: CVE-2021-35473 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in LemonLDAP::NG before 2.0.12. There is a missingexpiration check in the OAuth2.0 handler, i.e., it does not verify accesstoken validity. An attacker can use a expired access token from an OIDCclient to access the OAuth2 handler The earliest affected version is 2.0.4.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
